product_name: Bladerunner Ice Zepher Ice Skates - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Skaters of all skill levels will relish the padded, insulated comfort and performance of the women's Zephyr Ice Skates from Bladerunner Ice. Lightweight, articulated design offers excellent control. Hinged, molded cuff provides lateral support and forward flex. Padded velvet liner with Thinsulate insulation adds comfort and warmth and eliminates the need to "break in" skates. Pull-loop on the tongue enables easy foot entry. Bladerunner Ice Zephyr Ice Skates feature a carbon-steel blade with toe picks. Special Buy.
short_description: Skaters of all skill levels will relish the padded, insulated comfort and performance of the women's Zephyr Ice Skates from Bladerunner Ice.
